item.description:
A Night Of Sinatra- with charasmatic singer Rich Demare- KISS 108 Personality

 

* Sinatra inspired cocktail specials- The Perfect Jack Manhattan

                                                        The Big Appletini & more........

                                                        

Reinvent your Thursdays with cool jazz and hot bites from 6pm-9pm.Trendy appetizers, funky cocktails, smooth jazz and mingling await the discerning diner and fun-seeker every Thursday night. Chef Scott features five delectable bar bites each week, great for sharing and sampling a variety of tastes.

* 5 Delectable Bar Bites: $5 each.

*Specialty Drinks: $8.00 

Try Thursdays at Seaglass and live a little! Available at the bar and in the lounge.
item.how_to_find_us: We should be in the lounge or bar.... I will have a meetup sign on our table(s)

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Music, Martinis,Manhattans, and More- A Night Of Sinatra
